DESCRIPTION.VERBATIM:
Source: Scottish Hill Runners Association
Taken From: Atkinson's discussion of Chatterjee and Hadi (1986), Statistical Science, p. 400.
Dimension: 35 observations on 3 variables
Description: The observations are: 1. Greenmantle New Year Dash 19. Black Hill 2. Carnethy 5 Hill Race 20. Creag Beag 3. Craig Dunain 21. Kildoon 4. Ben Rha 22. Meall Ant-Suiche 5. Ben Lomond 23. Half Ben Nevis 6. Goatfell 24. Cow Hill 7. Bens of Jura 25. North Berwick Law 8. Cairnpapple 26. Creag Dubh 9. Scolty 27. Burnswark 10. Traprain Law 28. Largo 11. Lairig Ghru 29. Criffel 12. Dollar 30. Achmony 13. Lomonds of Fife 31. Ben Nevis 14. Cairn Table 32. Knockfarrel 15. Eildon Two 33. Two Breweries Fell 16. Cairngorm 34. Cockleroi 17. Seven Hills of Edinburgh 35. Moffat Chase 18. Knock Hill
Column Definition 1 Distance (miles) 2 Climb (ft) 3 Time (seconds)
